title: Hilary Duff has her hands full as she carries daughter Banks and an iced coffee
text:
She's gearing up to reprise her role as Lizzie McGuire in an upcoming reboot of the early-00's hit TV series.

But Hilary Duff was focused on her role as mom on Thursday as she was spotted leaving Joan's on Third in Los Angeles cradling her 11-month-old daughter Banks in one arm.

The 32-year-old actress cut a casual figure in some lavender biker shorts with a floral print paired with a white tank and an oversize green bomber jacket.

There's mommy! Hilary Duff was focused on her role as mom on Thursday as she was spotted leaving Joan's on Third in Los Angeles cradling her 11-month-old daughter Banks in one arm

She accessorized with gold hoop earrings, a gold chain necklace and a set of yellow and peach running sneakers by Nike.

Little Banks was sitting pretty in a mustard yellow pintucked blouse with soft dusty blue leggings.

Her sighting comes as she recently revealed more details about the upcoming Lizzie McGuire reboot in an interview with E! News.

Cute: The 32-year-old actress cut a casual figure in some lavender biker shorts with a floral print paired with a white tank and an oversize green bomber jacket

Duff divulged that though her character might be at a later stage in life than the original show, she still has a lot of growing up to do.

'I have said this before, but for me coming back when she's 30 and she's not in a marriage and she's not having a baby and she's not doing all the things that I have already done in my life, that story is really exciting for me,' she told the outlet.

'I think to myself, where can we go? What are the struggles of a 30-year-old right now?

Chic: She accessorized with gold hoop earrings, a gold chain necklace and a set of yellow and peach running sneakers by Nike

'What are the pressures that life throws in front of a woman who is 30 and doesn't have all the things yet?

'And for me, that's Lizzie McGuire, she had those struggles in middle school where she didn't have a place where she fits in ... but she's also your best friend, and that's exactly what I want to target and hit home again - is being there for girls in this time of their life.'

There's also a lot more still to be determined for the show's story lines, but the star says that she's ready to 'give fans what they want.'

Adorable: Little Banks was sitting pretty in a mustard yellow pintucked blouse with soft dusty blue leggings

'Maybe at the end of the series we see her having a baby?

'You know, maybe it's hard for her to get pregnant? Maybe there is something bad happening on her 30th birthday in the first episode?

'Maybe she's going to be in her childhood bedroom in the first episode? I don't know,' Duff said.

The actress will play a 30-year-old Lizzie doing her best to make it in New York City.

Production for the show is set for the end of October.
description: She's gearing up to reprise her role as Lizzie McGuire in an upcoming reboot of the early-00's hit TV series.
